author: Aaron Weaver
title: How Can Trump Get Revenge on Jeff Bezos & Win 2020? Kill the Post Office
description:
Donald Trump wants to win the 2020 election and get vengeance against Jeff Bezos. All he has to do is keep idly watching the U.S. Postal Service drown. 
The post How Can Trump Get Revenge on Jeff Bezos & Win 2020? Kill the Post Office appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• The U.S. Postal Service appears to be on its last leg.
  • Donald Trump has shunned the USPS when theyve looked for help.
  • If the USPS dissolves, Trump will get revenge on Jeff Bezos, reward some of his friends, and increase his chances of … [+4164 chars]
